document_data.name: Tozad
document_data.mainbody:
Tracker '''Tozad''' was a [[goblin]] [[cult of the Absolute|cultist]] and novice of [[the Absolute]] in late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Look at this. Priestess Gut burned me good.|Tracker Tozad.}}
document_data.Description:
Tozad had green-brown skin and brown hair combed over to one side. He wore patches of bone-and-[[leather]] armor, fastened together with straps.

He was among the goblin cutlists branded with the ''[[mark of the Absolute]]''.
document_data.Possessions: He fought with a crude, goblin-made [[bow]].
document_data.History: As of the the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Tracker Tozad remained stationed at the [[Shattered Sanctum]].
